message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product.  Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $950,000 undervalues the product significantly.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This offer represents a substantial savings for you while recognizing its true worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer. To show I'm serious about finding an agreement, I'm willing to drop to $1,000,000 even. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $920,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
